QueryDefinition.Query:
with a as ( select d.encid, ch.person_id as PersonId, diag_date, case when primary_diagnosis = '1' then 44786627 else 44786629 end as TypeId, replace(replace(replace(diagnosis_cd, chr(9), ''), chr(10), ''), chr(13), '') as diagnosis_cd, diagnosis_cd_type, case when diagnosis_cd_type IN ('ICD9') then replace(replace(replace(diagnosis_cd, chr(9), ''), chr(10), ''), chr(13), '') else NULL end as icd9, case when diagnosis_cd_type IN ('ICD10') then replace(replace(replace(diagnosis_cd, chr(9), ''), chr(10), ''), chr(13), '') else NULL end as icd10, case when diagnosis_cd_type IN ('UNKNOWN') AND DIAG_DATE < 'October 1, 2015' then replace(replace(replace(diagnosis_cd, chr(9), ''), chr(10), ''), chr(13), '') else NULL end as icd9dots, case when diagnosis_cd_type IN ('UNKNOWN') AND DIAG_DATE >= 'October 1, 2015' then replace(replace(replace(diagnosis_cd, chr(9), ''), chr(10), ''), chr(13), '') else NULL end as icd10dots, case when diagnosis_cd_type IN ('SNOMED') then replace(replace(replace(diagnosis_cd, chr(9), ''), chr(10), ''), chr(13), '') else NULL end as snomed, case when diagnosis_cd_type NOT IN ('ICD9', 'ICD10', 'SNOMED') then replace(replace(replace(diagnosis_cd, chr(9), ''), chr(10), ''), chr(13), '') else NULL end as others, admitting_diagnosis, discharge_diagnosis, poa, primary_diagnosis, diagnosis_status, case when diagnosis_status = 'History of' then 4167529 when diagnosis_status = 'Possible diagnosis of' then 4208085 when admitting_diagnosis = 1 then 4203942 when discharge_diagnosis = 1 then 4230359 when primary_diagnosis = 1 then 4307107 END as condition_status_concept_id, CASE WHEN admitting_diagnosis = '1' THEN 'ADMITTING_DIAGNOSIS;' ELSE '' END AS ad, CASE WHEN discharge_diagnosis = '1' THEN 'DISCHARGE_DIAGNOSIS;' ELSE '' END AS dd, CASE WHEN poa = '1' THEN 'POA;' ELSE '' END AS p, CASE WHEN primary_diagnosis = '1' THEN 'PRIMARY_DIAGNOSIS;' ELSE '' END AS pd from {sc}.diagnosis as d JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND d.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE )
select *, diagnosis_status + ';' + ad + dd + p + pd as condition_status_source_value, case when icd9 is null and icd10 is null and icd9dots is null and icd10dots is null and snomed is null and diagnosis_cd_type NOT IN ('ICD9', 'ICD10', 'SNOMED') or diagnosis_cd_type is NULL then 1 else 0 end as unknown from a order by PersonId
